name: The Child Spirit
description:
Description

The Child Spirit is a game I created for the Ludum Dare. You play a fox gathering forest animals to make the Great Spirit come back. The contest theme was "Growing, two buttons control". I made everything from scratch (except the ambience nature sounds) in more or less 25h.

The game is made with Unity in C# and I wanted to work mainly on the atmosphere, despite the very short time available.

Goal

The “Child Spirit” is a simple non linear runner game where you play a fox. You must find animals and get back the Forest Spirit who is leaving. The goal is more or less in line with the “growing” theme, as you’re supposed to grow a herd of the forest animals.

Controls
  • Space or S : jump
  • Return or D : switch direction
